Stomping their feet, whooping, hollering, raising their arms and hands in rejoicing, singing out "Hallelujan!"--Scalia, Thomas and Alito.
 
 Stunning to see black robed fellows acting as cheerleaders at Bush's State of the Union thing!
 
 Has that ever happened before in our nation's history?

post_info.post_title: And the Supremes Did the Wave

wait what? Surely you aren't telling me you thought Scalia, Thomas, and Alito were at the SOTU address.
 
 You do realize it was Roberts, Thomas, BREYER, and Alito. Scalia never attends those things and Breyer is the most liberal judge..he has been to most of them. 
 
 I hope I am just not understanding your post.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  And the Supremes Did the Wave
